name: The Amazing Spider-Man and Captain America in Dr. Doom's Revenge!
name_original: The Amazing Spider-Man and Captain America in Dr. Doom's Revenge!
description: The Amazing Spider-Man and Captain America in Dr. Doom's Revenge! is a side-scrolling computer game starring Marvel Comics' superheroes Spider-Man and Captain America battling a host of supervillains led by Doctor Doom. The player alternately controls Spider-Man and Captain America; the character being controlled switches after each battle.
